statements: DELETE FROM farmers WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND risk_factor > 0.5;
DELETE FROM insurance_premiums WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' AND farmer_id IN (SELECT farmer_id FROM farmers WHERE risk_factor > 0.5);
DELETE FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_id = 101 AND farmer_id = 201;
DELETE FROM farmers WHERE farmer_age < 30 AND farmer_address LIKE '%California%';
DELETE FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE policy_type = 'Crop Damage';
DELETE FROM premium_calculation WHERE farmer_id = 100 AND crop_id = 200 AND factor_id = 300;
